articles.author: Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: The words of Sidney Poitier that help explain his views on race - CNN
articles.description: Sidney Poitier refused to be defined by race from the start of his decades-long career, but his best-known performances advanced the depiction of Black actors and pushed audiences to confront racial tensions in America.
